The shirt was light blue, not pink.

The photograph of Governor Warner on the cover of the magazine was odd, even unflattering in a way that goes beyond the color of his tie.
Kathy Ryan is photo editor of the New York Times Magazine.
Ms. Ryan, welcome to the program.
And that editor's note went on to say that the newspaper's policy rules out alterations of photographs that depict news scenes.
That's not this.
